page.title: 11Medical Care on Papa Stour.
page.content: If you have a minor illness you have to ring the doctor on the Mainland, because there is no resident nurse. The doctor may prescribe medicine which can be dispensed by a lady on the island. In an emergency you may need to be transported to the hospital in Lerwick (on the Mainland).The{Aith Lifeboat} may be called upon to make the trip across St.Magnus Bay,or a small plane may attempt to land on our unsurfaced air-strip. Last year a helicopter was used for the first time in an emergency.A school-boy with suspected head injuries was taken to hospital on a black and windy night.All the tractors on the island went to the air-strip and illuminated the landing place with their headlights.Fortunately,we are a healthy lot and accidents are rare.
